info.title: Ent Schema API
info.description: This is an auto generated API description made out of an Ent schema definition

get.description: List Checks.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new Check and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the Check with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: Check with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the Check with the requested ID.

204.description: Check with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a Check and persists changes to storage.

get.description: Find the attached Competition of the Check with the given ID

200.description: Competition attached to Check with requested ID was found

get.description: Find the attached Round of the Check with the given ID

200.description: Round attached to Check with requested ID was found

get.description: Find the attached Service of the Check with the given ID

200.description: Service attached to Check with requested ID was found
